text_block_list.text: On a certain day, as I was heading to the trainer's office ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡¡Huuuyyy!!

A scream rang out from the direction of the infirmary. 
That's El Condor Pasa's voice…!
Let me go check it out…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Uuuuy, no no no, this can't be…! 
I need to heal and get training!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
A masked El is a strong El…! 
A strong, brave, invincible, ideal horsegirl…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's okay, it's okay. El is strong, El is strong! 
So, it's okay……!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Órale, I can ru— ¿¡Ay ay ay!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¿¡Aaaaaay caramba!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
T-T-T-T-T-Trainer! Close! Your! Eyes! 
Right now!! ¡¡¡¡Ándale!!!!

I promptly shut my eyes at the tremendous 
force behind her words.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mm'dere we go…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… Okay. You can look now, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Phoo… Nooothing went on here! Noothing at all, right? You didn't see anything, did you, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Did. You. Trainer!?
I gave in……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Okay, that's that then! …What are you 
doing here anyway, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ah, did you hear me shout earlier? 
Is that why you came to check on me?
choice_data_list: Your leg, is it hurting? Let me see.
Is your leg hurting? Let me see.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, no, this is nothing! 
Thanks for your concern, but I feel bueno!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
By the way, Trainer, did you just come flying in 
because you heard El's voice……?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Such passion!! I see it burns strong in you every day～!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It makes me very happy to be on the receiving end!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Because a trusty partner is essential to rule 
the world as the mightiest horsegirl!
choice_data_list: You're really aiming for the world, eh?
You're really aiming for the world, eh?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Tsk tsk, Trainer. I'm not aiming, I'm going to prooove it! So that I can say, "I am the strongest in the world"!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… I swore I would. On this mask papa gave me.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Papa said to me, "My mask is that of the greatest masked 
wrestler in the world! You wear this, you will in turn become 
the greatest in the world, El"!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's when the weak, timid, crybaby El-El I hated disappeared.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
In its place came bravery, determination, world-class speed! 
It was the hatching of the ultimate horsegirl, El Condor Pasaaa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I swore on this mask! I will make my name known 
as the strongest horsegirl in the wooorld!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: —— ¡Ay ay ay!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I-I'm fine, I'm fiiine!

Her condition isn't looking great though. Her body can't 
cope with the strain of training every single day……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right!! Today… I'm sort of dealing with a lot… 
But I'd love to go through your training next time!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hehehen… El knows. After all, you're the trainer who rushed to scout me straight away…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You've actually been itching like crazy 
to train with El, haven't you!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I will make your wish come true! 
See you on the training course! Ciao～!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: —— ¡¡Ayayayay!!

…… I feel like I'm being pulled along by her vigour a tad, 
but I was to accompany El Condor Pasa for training now.

She's aiming for the top of the world. What does she need 
for that right now? I need to give it some serious thought……
